title: Each Time We Pass
lyrics:
I live far
From your home
But I would come to meet you 
If you called
Yeah I would come to meet you 
If you called



Where you go

I'm not sure

I try to ignore it

It's getting to be boring



If you wondered why

Every time i’m speaking

I divert my eyes

So you can’t see me thinking



Anyone could read my mind

Anyone could read my mind, and



I’m not living in the world

I’ve gone way below

I’m not living in the world

I’ve gone way below

Way below

Way below

Way below



Whenever I'm alone I like to talk to

All the things that I've lost

Pens and fancy books

Ideas in the night

Subtext in conversations where

I’m sorry, you were right

I’m a fool

Don’t wait for me

I guess sometimes I feel like I'm alone

And the world isn’t

Don’t wait for me

Every time I do this

I wanna try undo it

I’m a fool

Don’t wait for me

'Cause I'm resigned and weeping in the chapel



Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me



Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me

Don't wait for me



Don't wait for me (and the world)

Don't wait for me (is lifted)

Don't wait for me (and the world)

Don't wait for me (is lifted)



I'm not living in the world

I've gone way below

I'm not living in the world

I've gone way below

I'm not living in the world

I've gone way below

I'm not living in the world
